title: 34. Athenian Religious Festivals
description: The scale, organisation, rituals, and social significance of religious festivals in classical Athens.

questions.question: According to Thucydides, what benefit did festivals provide Athenians?
options: Rest and respite from daily life

questions.question: What complaint does the Old Oligarch make about festivals?
options: They disrupted work due to their frequency

options: A wide variety of rituals and activities

options: A wooden statue of Dionysus Eleuthereus
